text: María Amanda Monterroso Asteguieta (born 30 November 1993) is a Guatemalan footballer who plays as a forward for Spanish Primera Nacional club CF PM Friol and the Guatemala women's national team. She is the sister of Coralia Monterroso. ==International goals== Scores and results list Guatemala's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" |- ! No. !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !! Score !! Result !!
